modName: Dragonborn Frea Follower for Lunari Race
summary:
Dragonborn Frea follower Lunari Race conversion
Required Mods:
Dragonborn DLC and
Lunari Race by bhaktisean
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21602

Changes Frea from the Dragonborn DLC to the Lunari Race with new face gen and hair.
descriptionHtml:
Dragonborn Frea follower Lunari Race conversion


Required Mods:

Dragonborn DLC and

Lunari Race by bhaktisean
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21602

(for those that have not heard of the Lunari Race, Its not a replacer just a custom race addon.) Won\'t change your NPC\'s in game.


Description:
Changes Frea from the Dragonborn DLC to the Lunari Race with new face gen and hair.


Install:
Copy the Data folder of this mod into your Skyrim Data Folder.
Then mark the esp active

FAQ:
Can I marry her?
Nope, Beth didn\'t include the dialog in her unique voice type.

Will this break my game?
Nope, didn\'t change anything but her race and facegen/hair

Can you change something about this mod for me?
Nope, So please don\'t ask. Had made this for myself and just released it for others to use if wanted.






Credits:

bhaktisean
for the great Lunari Race


Hair

Battler and YU011 Hair
Author: NewSea at TSR
Conversion: Room207
author: REZ
